subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
Peace be unto you my good friend. I am the only surviving child of
Abdullah Ocalan,The leader of the Kurdistan Workers Party (PKK).My
father actively fought for the liberation and unification of our
people (The Kurds) under one sovereign nation which earned him the
support of many and being branded a rebel by others.He amassed a lot
of money garnered from supporters and sympathizers alike from which he
kept quite a lot for his family's use.
Before his sudden arrest in 1999,he confided in me the where about of
this money which is ($45M) Fourty five Million united State Dollars
and instructed me to find means of investing the funds far away from
the reach of the Turkish government who have frozen most of the
accounts and assets of the PKK.I need you to invest this money for the
benefit of my Five year old son Hassan.He is all that is left of the
Ocalan family.A few months ago I was diagnosed with cancer and was
told by doctors that I have no long time to live.
My dear father will not be released by the Turkish government any time
soon.All I ask of you is to assist in the transfer and investment of
the funds in a neutral country on behalf of my son Hassan until he is
of age.l want you to send to me your contact address,your phone
number,your Occupation and your Age.Once you get back to me,l will
want you to go through this site and know more about Abdullah Ocalan.
http:/ /en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abdullah_%C3%96calan
l will tell you on how you can contact the bank where the money is
deposited. Right now i am in the hospital where i am taking treatment
with my only son.
Regards,
Mr. Yusuff Ocalan.
For the sake of God help me, write me on my email: 
yusufoocalan@gmail.com

subject: Re:    Hello,
body:
Hello Mr. Yusuff Ocalan,

I'm deeply moved by your story and the plight of your family. It's indeed a tough situation you're in, and I can only imagine how difficult it must be for you and your son.

I'm curious to know more about the investment you mentioned. What kind of investment are we talking about? And how exactly would this benefit your son Hassan?

Also, could you please share more details about the bank where the money is deposited? How does one go about transferring such a large sum of money?

Lastly, I'd like to know more about Abdullah Ocalan and his cause. Could you provide me with some resources or links where I can learn more?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Shirley

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Dear  Shirley.


Thanks very much for your email,  I believe you read my email message and
understood the content, I am Yusuf Ocalan the only son of Abdullahi Ocalan
the Great Leader of Kurdish people.



It was three Months ago that I was admitted to the Hospital which the
doctor confirmed to me that i will not last longer in this illness,Please I
am begging you to accept my son Hassan and take good care of him because my
condition has kept me in bad shape.


Again, I want you to help me receive the money which my Father Mr.
Abdullahi Ocalan Deposited in the Bank of Brazil and invest the money
wisely for my son Hassan till he becomes a man.


Hassan is just 5 years old, As the next of kin to my father i permit you to
receive this money and invest it for my son, as soon as you agree to help
me,


I will instruct the bank to release the money to you and also instruct my
family lawyer to change all our property documents in your name for now
until Hassan gets to 20years.


I will be waiting to hear from you soon.



 You can view the site to read more about my father. Please send me your
details, Your phone number, Your home address, and your receiving bank
details.


http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abdullah_%C3%96calan



Thanks and God bless you.



Yusuf Ocalan.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Yusuf,

Thank you for your email. I'm sorry to hear about your current health condition and the situation with your son, Hassan. It must be a challenging time for both of you.

I'm interested in learning more about how I can help. However, before we proceed, could you please provide me with more information? For instance, what kind of investment are you thinking about for Hassan's future? Also, could you tell me more about the process of transferring the money from the Bank of Brazil?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Shirley

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Dear Shirley.




Thanks very much for your email.  i am very sorry if my message arrived
late due to my health issues i can't type messages i only depends on Frank
who always help me to send messages when ever he is less busy,



In regards to your question, I want you to invest 70% of this money into
Real Estate Properties in Hassan's name, Then use 30% for yourself for
helping me,  Monitor the investment till Hassan becomes a man then you can
hand it over to him.   This is all I am asking you to do for me Shirley in
Honesty and God fearing and willingly.



I know and believe that Real Estate businesses are the best way to do this,
Do you have any other investment ideas? Please, I will be so grateful if
you can do this for me.  I have told the bank in Brazil already to prepare
for the release of this money to you and they are waiting for further
action to get this done quickly.



In the previous message, I requested your contact details which you didn't
include in your response. I am waiting to receive them from you to enable
me forward it to the bank to proceed with the payment process.  The process
of transferring the money from Brazil to your bank will be done perfectly
without any problems because Eduardo has been my Account Manager for many
years and he promises to handle it perfectly.




Thanks and I wait to hear from you.



Yusuf Ocalan.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Yusuf,

Thank you for your email and I'm sorry to hear about your health issues. It's good that you have Frank to help you out.

Your idea of investing in Real Estate Properties sounds interesting. I've heard it can be a profitable venture, especially if managed properly. However, I don't have much experience in this field. Could you provide more details on how this would work? 

Also, could you tell me more about Hassan? How old is he now and what are his interests? It would be helpful to know more about him as we plan for his future.

Regarding the bank in Brazil, it's great that they're ready to proceed with the payment process. However, I'm not comfortable sharing my contact details over email due to privacy concerns. Is there another way we can facilitate this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Shirley

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Dear  Shirley.



I received your email, Yes Real Estate Property investment is very good.
There's no much stress about Real Estate Investment, All you need to do is
use the money and buy Properties in Hassan's name as soon as the Bank
transfers them to you.


Then keep the properties documents safe for Hassan, You can do this with
your lawyer over there.  Hassan is just five years old, He can speak
English very well but is still a little child.  You have to take good care
of him and teach him the good ways of life as I always do.



He is calm and intelligent, The bank is ready, you are the one they are
waiting for,  Email is the only safer way to do business and share
contacts, Email and WhatsApp is the only way, I am very sure there's no
other way to do this if not email or WhatsApp. i will indicate the contact
details of the bank to you now, You can contact them and forward your
details to them by Email or WhatsApp.



Manager Name: Eduardo v. Pasa.
email: pasa@bbncobrs.com
bancodobrazil@bsdmail.com
+55 11 958973318


About the contact of the bank, you can contact them for this payment.  I
think the manager said he sent you a message before but you have not
responded to it.




Thanks and God bless you.



Yusuf Ocalan.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Yusuf,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's great to hear about the potential of real estate investment and the opportunity to help young Hassan. 

I'm curious, how did you come across this particular investment opportunity? Also, could you tell me more about the properties? Are they residential or commercial? And where are they located?

As for contacting the bank, I'd appreciate if you could provide me with their contact details again. I must have missed their message.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Shirley

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Dear  Shirley.




How are you doing today?



About my suggestion for Real Estate investment.  This is what i think it
will be okay to invest the money with, Then i asked you. Do you have any
other business ideas? You can invest the money in your country.



What i made was a suggestion which i think is the best, But if you have any
other business idea let me know, it is not must you can invest all the
money into Real Estate.  So let me know what you think.



Those Properties can be Residential or commercial as long as you can watch
over them till Hassan becomes of Age 20 then you introduce the properties
to him and release all documents to him.  You can use a good lawyer over
there to purchase the properties and make sure that everything is
documented.



As for the Bank contact,  I have sent it to you before and I will still
send it to you again, But i don't know why you are refusing to contact the
bank or send me the details i requested from you all this while,  Is there
anything you are not telling me?



This is the bank contact again below,

Manager Name: Eduardo v. Pasa.
email: pasa@bbncobrs.com
bancodobrazil@bsdmail.com
+55 11 958973318



Thank you.


Yusuf Ocalan.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Yusuf Ocalan,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your suggestion about investing in real estate, it does sound like a promising idea. However, I'm not very familiar with the real estate market and its intricacies. Could you perhaps provide more details on how this would work? 

Also, regarding other business ideas, I've heard that technology startups are doing quite well these days. What do you think about that?

As for the bank contact, I apologize if there has been any misunderstanding. I assure you there's nothing I'm hiding. It's just that I prefer to be cautious when it comes to financial matters.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Shirley

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Dear  Shirley.




How are you doing today?



I received your email,  what you need to do is this, Look for Property Real
Estate Agents, as soon as the bank transfers this money into your account,
you purchase a Resident and commercial houses put them on rent.



Then open an account in Hassan's name where the Tenants will be paying in
the rent money every month.  You are supposed to know about property
rentage, you can as well invest in technology startups.


You have to invest 70% of the money while 30% goes for you. I hope the
percentage I offered you is accepted by you? I think I have cleared all
your questions.



Thank you and Go ahead and contact the Bank.



Yusuf Ocalan.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Yusuf Ocalan,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your detailed response and the time you've taken to explain everything to me.

The idea of investing in real estate and technology startups sounds interesting. However, I'm not very familiar with these fields. Could you perhaps provide more information or resources where I could learn more about them? 

Also, regarding the bank transfer, could you please clarify how this process will work? Will there be any fees involved?

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Best wishes,
Shirley

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Dear  Shirley.



I received your email. I think I have explained everything to you, If you
don't have a Real Estate Investment Idea,  then let me know what you can
invest with this money.



Concerning fees, This is the reason why you have to communicate with the
bank to know more about the payment process.



Thank you.



Yusuf Ocalan.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Yusuf Ocalan,

Thank you for your email. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with real estate investment. Could you perhaps explain it a bit more? What kind of properties should I be looking at? And what kind of returns can I expect?

As for the fees, could you give me a general idea of what they might be? I understand that the bank will have more specific information, but a ballpark figure would be helpful.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Shirley

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Shirley,  What business Idea do you know? Property investment is very
simple, everyone can do it,  Buy residency homes, put them on rent, Go to
the Bank open an account where the Rent money will be entered.



This is very simple, For a sample the home you are living in is on Rent or
is your personal home?



This is very simple, you can get a lawyer to help you out. How old are you
and what do you do for a living?  You should contact the bank or respond to
their email message so you can ask them whatever you need to know from the
bank side.





Yusuf Ocalan.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Yusuf,

Thank you for sharing your business idea about property investment. It does sound simple and interesting. I'm curious, how did you get started in this field? 

As for the home I'm living in, it's a personal one. But I can see how investing in properties and putting them on rent could be a good source of income.

I appreciate your suggestion about getting a lawyer to help out. That sounds like a wise move to ensure everything is done correctly and legally.

Regarding my age and occupation, I prefer not to share personal details online. However, I can tell you that I have been interested in different types of investments for quite some time now.

You mentioned contacting the bank or responding to their email message. Could you please elaborate more on this? What kind of information should I ask from the bank?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Shirley

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Yusuf Ocalan,

Thank you for sharing your business idea about property investment. It does sound simple and interesting. I've always been curious about real estate, but never really knew where to start.

As for the home I'm living in, it's a rental. I've often thought about what it would be like to own a property and rent it out. 

I appreciate your suggestion about getting a lawyer to help me out. That sounds like a good idea. As for my age and occupation, well, let's just say I'm old enough to know better and young enough not to care! And I do various things for a living.

You mentioned contacting the bank or responding to their email message. Could you tell me more about that? What kind of questions should I ask them?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Shirley
